function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to contact with different numbers of agents in a built environment.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases to occupants and increased risk of infection.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce direct contact between individuals, improve air ventilation, and enforce hygiene protocols.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters, occupancy monitoring systems, and contact tracing technology.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and staff in the built environment.","Owner":"Building management, employers, and public health authorities."}]}
